name: cal
description: Homegrown calendar-as-a-service, mainly for my personal use.

scripts.build:style: node-sass client/components/notes/Notes.scss public/notes.css ; node-sass client/components/calendar/Calendar.scss public/calendar.css ; node-sass client/components/contacts/Contacts.scss public/contacts.css
scripts.build: npm run build:style && npm run build:js
scripts.watch:style: parallelshell "node-sass --watch client/components/notes/Notes.scss public/notes.css" "node-sass --watch client/components/calendar/Calendar.scss public/calendar.css" "node-sass --watch client/components/contacts/Contacts.scss public/contacts.css"

author: Brandon Smith
